meaning_str.bing:
n. 四月
网络. 四月份；四月之春；阿普里尔

四月份；四月之春；阿普里尔

四月；4月；阿普丽尔（女子名）

1.en: But he was one of the 9, 000 victims of tobacco who had been given leave to bring his own case, and in April he was scheduled to.
1.cn: 然而他是9000名烟草受害者之一，他们被规定去取来病历，而且在四月份他已被安排去取病历。

2.en: While April exports had risen 24 per cent from a year ago, industrial production disappointed just a 7 per cent increase.
2.cn: 尽管4月份台湾出口同比增长24%，但工业产值却仅增长7%，这一结果令人失望。

3.en: The accord amounted to an implicit assurance to help Athens if it had problems in refinancing debt in April and May.
3.cn: 该承诺相当于隐含保证，如果希腊在4、5月份为其债务再融资出现问题，将提供帮助。

0.en: If your feelings are still what they were last April, tell me so at once.
0.cn: 请你老实告诉我，你的心情是否还和四月里一样。

1.en: Perfect. Thank God somebody came to work today. What about accessories for April?
1.cn: 很好，谢天谢地，还是有人来上班的。四月的首饰版面呢？

2.en: So the diamond had to have gone down with the ship. You see the date? April 14, 1912.
2.cn: 因此项链，一定跟着船沉入海底了，看到日期没有? 一九一二年四月十四日。

3.en: Not really. We have a lot of turnover here. That flag outside has been at half-mast since April. That's why we have these.
3.cn: 也不行。这里经常有人去世。从四月以来，外面就一直在降半旗。所以才有这个。

4.en: Hey Chandler, look, you're in here too. April 18th, excessive noise. Italian guy's gay roommate comes home with the dry-cleaning.
4.cn: 你也在里面四月十八日，噪音过度，意大利佬的同性恋室友带了干洗衣服回家。

5.en: Look at this. My Big Book of Grievances. Hey, there's me! April 17th. Excessive noise. Italian guy comes home with a date.
5.cn: 看看这个！我的痛苦之书。嘿，这是我！四月十七日，噪音过度，意大利佬带了女伴回家。

6.en: Time to put the camera away, April. Aw, Dad!
6.cn: 把录影机关了，艾波。喔，不，爸爸！

7.en: I never had a voice then, but I thank you now, April.
7.cn: 我当时还不能说话，但是我现在要谢谢你，爱普尔。

8.en: Good evening. This is April O'Neil, reporting live from my daddy's lab.
8.cn: 晚上好，我是艾波欧尼尔，我正在我爸爸的实验室里进行现场报道。

9.en: April! Woman of the hour. Everyone is so excited for your parent party tonight.
9.cn: 艾普莉！焦点女人，大家都激动地等待你今晚的家长派对。

10.en: And then our next pollination is apples in Pennsylvania in the middle of April.
10.cn: 然后我们的下一站是宾夕法尼亚的苹果，在4月中旬。

11.en: Of course you did. April, the mutagen possesses powers beyond our wildest hopes.
11.cn: 当然，你的确会去救，爱普尔，那些突变体带来的力量超出了我们的预期。

12.en: Listen closely, April. I don't remember a time before living in that laboratory.
12.cn: 听我说，爱普尔，被带到实验室之前的事情我都不记得了。

13.en: At least that's what he told me. After he was flirting with April and eating your leftover shrimp.
13.cn: 至少他是这么跟我说的，虽然当时他在和爱普尔调情，还吃了您剩下的虾。

14.en: Oh, then I must be confused then, 'cause I just saw you chatting it up with April, when I got a salad bar that needs a refill.
14.cn: 是吗，那我就不理解了，刚刚我还看见你和爱普尔在闲聊，外面的自助沙拉都快不够了。

15.en: Proceed. Very well. Count the first: On or about the 28th day of April, the accused did knowingly and with malice aforethought deny access to the shared bathroom in a time of emergency, to wit, my back teeth were floating.
15.cn: 继续。很好，"罪行一，4月28日左右在紧急时刻，确切地说在"明知我的牙都被水淹了"的情况下，被告蓄意预谋拒绝我使用共用洗手间。
